element.name: Code
element.desc: Exceptionality description/code which identifies the exceptionality or areas of need of the student. Not all programs require identification of an exceptionality. If required for this program type, must have at least one element with ExceptionalityPriority attribute = "Primary".

element.name: ExceptionalityPriority
element.desc: Identifies priority of the exceptionality. "Primary" is the first and is required even if only one exceptionality is specified. "Secondary", etc. are of lower priority. Primary, Secondary, and Tertiary must be specified before "Additional" is used.

value.name: PRIMARY
value.desc: Identifies relative severity of disability - only one can be primary

value.name: SECONDARY
value.desc: Identifies relative severity of disability - only one can be secondary

value.name: TERTIARY
value.desc: Identifies relative severity of disability - only one can be tertiary

value.name: ADDITIONAL
value.desc: Multiple disabilities can be identified as "Additional"

element.name: Code

value.name: INSTRUCTION
value.desc: Instruction Activities which involve direct interaction between teachers and students. Instruction may be provided for students in a school classroom, in another location such as a home or hospital, and in other learning situations such as those involving cocurricular activities. It may also be provided through some other approved medium such as television, radio, telephone, computer and correspondence. This includes aides and classroom assistants of any type (e.g., clerks or graders) who assist in the instructional process.

value.name: SUPPORT_SERVICES
value.desc: Support services Services to provide administrative, technical, personal (e.g., guidance and health), and logistical support to facilitate and enhance instruction. These services exist as adjuncts for fulfilling the objectives of instruction, community services and enterprise programs, rather than as entities within themselves.

value.name: STUDENT_SUPPORT_SERVICES
value.desc: Student support services Activities to assess and improve the well-being of students and to supplement the instructional process.

value.name: ATTENDANCE_AND_SOCIAL_WORK
value.desc: Attendance and social work Activities to improve student attendance at school and which attempt to prevent or solve student problems involving the home, school, and community. They also include registration activities for adult education programs.

value.name: SUPERVISION_OF_ATTENDANCE_AND_SOCIAL_WORK
value.desc: Supervision of attendance and social work Activities to direct, manage, and supervise attendance and social work services.

value.name: ATTENDANCE_SERVICES
value.desc: Attendance services Activities to promptly identify non-attendance patterns, promote improved attitudes toward attendance, analyze causes of non-attendance, act on non-attendance problems, and enforce compulsory attendance laws.

value.name: SOCIAL_WORK_SERVICES
value.desc: Social work services Activities to investigate and diagnose student problems arising out of the home, school, or community; provide casework and group work services for the child, parent, or both; interpret the problems of students for other staff members; and promote modification of the circumstances surrounding the individual student which are related to his or her problem.

value.name: STUDENT_ACCOUNTING_SERVICES
value.desc: Student accounting services Activities to acquire and maintain records of school attendance, location of home, family characteristics, and other census data. Portions of these records become a part of the cumulative record which is sorted and stored for teacher and guidance information. These include the preparation of pertinent statistical reports.

value.name: OTHER_ATTENDANCE_AND_SOCIAL_WORK
value.desc: Other attendance and social work services Other attendance and social work services which cannot be classified above.

value.name: GUIDANCE_SERVICES
value.desc: Guidance services Activities to counsel with students and parents; consult with other staff members on learning problems; evaluate the abilities of students; assist students as they make their own educational and career plans and choices; assist students in personal and social development; provide referral assistance; and work with other staff members in planning and conducting guidance programs for students.

value.name: SUPERVISION_OF_GUIDANCE_SERVICES
value.desc: Supervision of guidance services Activities to direct, manage, and supervise guidance services.

value.name: COUNSELING_SERVICES
value.desc: Counseling services Activities to help a student to better identify his or her perceived educational, personal, or occupational potential; relate his or her abilities, emotions, and aptitudes to educational and career opportunities; utilize his or her abilities in formulating realistic plans; and achieve satisfying personal and social development. These activities take place between one or more counselors and one or more students as counselees, between students and students, and between counselors and other staff members.

value.name: APPRAISAL_SERVICES
value.desc: Appraisal services Activities to assess student characteristics which are used in administration, instruction, and guidance; and assist the student in assessing his or her purposes and progress in personality and career development.

value.name: IS_INFO
value.desc: Information services Activities to disseminate educational, occupational, and personal/social information to help acquaint students with the curriculum and also with educational and vocational opportunities and requirements. Such information might be provided directly to students through group activities or it might be provided indirectly to students through other staff members or parents.

value.name: RECORD_MAINTENANCE_SERVICES
value.desc: Record maintenance services Activities to compile, maintain, and interpret cumulative records for individual students, including systematic consideration of such factors as home and family background, physical and medical status, standardized test results, personal and social development and school performance.

value.name: PLACEMENT_SERVICES
value.desc: Placement services Activities to help place students in appropriate situations. These could be educational situations, part-time employment while in school, and appropriate educational and occupational situations after they leave school. These activities also help ease the students' transition from one educational experience to another. The transition may include, for example, admissions counseling, referral services, assistance with records, and follow-up communications with employers.

value.name: OTHER_GUIDANCE_SERVICES
value.desc: Other guidance services Other guidance services which cannot be classified above.

value.name: HEALTH_SERVICES
value.desc: Health services Activities to provide physical and mental health services which are not direct instruction. They include activities that provide students with appropriate medical, dental, and nursing services.

value.name: SUPERVISION_OF_HEALTH_SERVICES
value.desc: Supervision of health services Activities to direct, engage, and supervise health services.

value.name: MEDICAL_SERVICES
value.desc: Medical services Activities to improve the physical and mental health of students such as health appraisal, including screening for vision, hearing deficiencies and communicable diseases; screening for psychiatric services; periodic health examinations; emergency injury and illness care; and communications with parents and medical officials.

value.name: DENTAL_SERVICES
value.desc: Dental services Activities to perform dental screening, dental care, and orthodontic activities.

value.name: NURSING_SERVICES
value.desc: Nursing services Activities to perform nursing such as health inspection, treatment of minor injuries, and referrals for other health services.

value.name: OTHER_HEALTH_SERVICES
value.desc: Other health services Other health services which cannot be classified above.

value.name: PSYCHOLOGICAL_SERVICES
value.desc: Psychological services Activities concerned with administering psychological tests and interpreting the results; gathering and interpreting information about student behavior; and working with other staff members in planning school programs to meet the special needs of students as indicated by psychological tests and behavioral evaluation. They also include planning and managing a program of psychological services encompassing psychological counseling for students, staff, and parents.

value.name: SUPERVISION_OF_PSYCHOLOGICAL_S
value.desc: Supervision of psychological services Activities to direct, manage, and supervise psychological services.

value.name: PSYCHOLOGICAL_TESTING
value.desc: Psychological testing services Activities to administer psychological tests, standardized tests, and inventory assessments. These tests measure ability, aptitude, achievement, interests, and personality. These activities also include interpretation of these measurements for students, other staff members, and parents.

value.name: PSYCHOLOGICAL_COUNSELING
value.desc: Psychological counseling services Activities to help students perceive, clarify, and solve problems of adjustment and interpersonal relationships. These activities take place between a school psychologist or other qualified individual as counselor, and one or more students as counselees.

value.name: PSYCHOTHERAPY_SERVICES
value.desc: Psychotherapy services Activities to help students to perceive, clarify, and work through emotional problems or disorders. These activities involve a therapeutic relationship between a qualified mental health professional and one or more students.

value.name: OTHER_PSYCHOLOGICAL_SERVICES
value.desc: Other psychological services Other psychological services which cannot be classified above.

value.name: SPEECH_PATHOLOGY_AND_AUDIOLOGY
value.desc: Speech pathology and audiology services Activities to identify, assess, and treat students with speech, hearing, and language impairments.

value.name: SUPERVISION_OF_SPEECH_PATHOLOGICAL
value.desc: Supervision of speech pathology and audiology services Activities to direct, manage, and supervise speech pathology and audiology services.

value.name: SPEECH_PATHOLOGY_SERVICES
value.desc: Speech pathology services Activities to identify students with speech and language disorders; diagnose and appraise specific speech and language disorders; refer problems for medical or other professional attention necessary to treat speech and language disorders; provide required speech treatment services; and counsel and guide students, parents, and teachers.

value.name: AUDIOLOGICAL_SERVICES
value.desc: Audiological services Activities to: 1) identify individuals with hearing loss; 2) determine the range, nature, and degree of hearing loss, including referral for medical or other professional attention; 3) provide habilitating activities such as language habilitation, auditory training, speech reading (lipreading), hearing evaluation, and speech conservation; 4) create and administer programs for prevention of hearing loss; 5) counsel and guide students, parent/guardians, and teachers regarding hearing loss; and 6) determine an individual's need for group and individual amplification, select and fit an appropriate aid, and evaluate the effectiveness of amplification.

value.name: OTHER_SPEECH_PATHOLOGY_AND_AUDIO
value.desc: Other speech pathology and audiology services Other speech pathology and audiology services which cannot be classified above.

value.name: OTHER_STUDENT_SUPPORT_SERVICES
value.desc: Other student support services Other student support services which cannot be classified above.

value.name: INSTRUCTIONAL_STAFF_SUPPORT
value.desc: Instructional staff support services Activities to assist the instructional staff with content and process of providing learning experiences for students.

value.name: IMPROVEMENT_OF_INSTRUCTIONAL_INSTR
value.desc: Improvement of instructional services Activities to primarily assist the instructional staff in planning, developing, and evaluating the process of providing learning experiences for students. These include curriculum development, techniques of instruction, child development, and staff training.

value.name: SUPERVISION_OF_IMPROVEMENT_OF_ISNTR
value.desc: Supervision of improvement of instruction services Activities to direct, manage, and supervise the improvement of instructional services.

value.name: INSTRUCTION_AND_CURRICULUM_DEV
value.desc: Instruction and curriculum development services Activities to assist teachers in developing the curriculum, preparing and utilizing special curriculum materials, and becoming acquainted with the various techniques which stimulate and motivate students .

value.name: INSTRUCTIONAL_STAFF_TRAINING
value.desc: Instructional staff training services Activities to promote the professional or occupational growth and competence of members of the instructional staff during the time of their service to the school or school system. These include workshops, demonstrations, school visits, courses for college credit, sabbatical leaves, and travel leaves.

value.name: OTHER_IMPROVEMENT_OF_INSTR
value.desc: Other improvement of instruction services Other improvement of instruction services which cannot be classified above.

value.name: EDUCATIONAL_MEDIA_SERVICES
value.desc: Educational media services Activities to coordinate the use of hardware, devices, content materials (including printed and non-printed sensory materials), methods, or experiences for teaching and learning purposes.

value.name: SUPERVISION_OF_EDUCATIONAL_MED
value.desc: Supervision of educational media services Activities to direct, manage, and supervise educational media services.

value.name: SCHOOL_LIBRARY_SERVICES
value.desc: School library services Activities to select, acquire, prepare, catalog, and circulate books and other printed materials; plan the use of the library by students, teachers and other members of the instructional staff; and guide individuals in their use of library books and materials whether maintained separately or as a part of an instructional materials center and/or related work study area.

value.name: AUDIOVISUAL_SERVICES
value.desc: Audiovisual services Activities to select, prepare, care for, and make available to the instructional staff: equipment, films, filmstrips, transparencies, tapes, television programs, and other similar materials, whether maintained separately or as a part of an instructional materials center. These activities include an audiovisual center, television studio, related work-study areas, and the services provided by audiovisual personnel.

value.name: EDUCATIONAL_TELEVISION_SERVICE
value.desc: Educational television services Activities to plan, program, write, and present educational programs or segments of programs by closed circuit or broadcast television.

value.name: COMPUTER-ASSISTED_INSTRUCTION_
value.desc: Computer-assisted instruction services Activities to plan, program, write, and present educational lessons which have been especially programmed for a computer to be used as the principal medium of instruction.

value.name: OTHER_EDUCATIONAL_MEDIA_SERV
value.desc: Other educational media services Other educational media services which cannot be classified above.

value.name: OTHER_INSTRUCTIONAL_STAFF_SUP
value.desc: Other instructional staff support services Other instructional staff support services which cannot be classified above.

value.name: GENERAL_ADMINISTRATION_SUPPORT
value.desc: General administration support services Activities to establish and administer policy for operating a school system.

value.name: BOARD_OF_EDUCATION_SERVICES
value.desc: Board of education services Activities to perform the duties of an elected body which has been created according to state law and vested with responsibilities for educational activities in a given administrative unit.

value.name: SUPERVISION_OF_BOARD_OF_ED
value.desc: Supervision of board of education services Activities to direct, manage, and supervise the general operation of the board of education. These include the activities of the members of the board of education, but do not include any special activities defined in other areas of responsibility described below. They also include any activities of the district performed in support of the school district meeting. These may include legal activities such as interpreting the laws and statutes and general liability situations, and the activities of external auditors.

value.name: BOARD_SECRETARY_CLERK_SERVICES
value.desc: Board secretary/clerk services Activities to perform the duties of the secretary or clerk of the board of education.

value.name: BOARD_TREASURER_SERVICES
value.desc: Board treasurer services Activities to perform the duties of the treasurer of the board of education

value.name: ELECTION_SERVICES
value.desc: Election services Activities to perform duties involved with any school system election, including the election of officers and bond elections.

value.name: TAX_ASSESSMENT_AND_COLLECTION_
value.desc: Tax assessment and collection services Activities to perform duties involved with tax assessment and collection.

value.name: STAFF_RELATIONS_AND_NEGOTIATION
value.desc: Staff relations and negotiations services Activities to perform duties involved with staff relations systemwide and contractual negotiations with both instructional and non-instructional personnel.

value.name: OTHER_BOARD_OF_EDUCATION_SERV
value.desc: Other board of education services Other board of education services which cannot be classified above.

value.name: EXECUTIVE_ADMINISTRATION_SERV
value.desc: Executive administration services Activities to perform the overall general administration or executive duties of the entire school system.

value.name: OFFICE_OF_THE_SUPERINTENDENT
value.desc: Office of the superintendent services Activities to direct and manage all affairs of the school system. These are performed by the superintendent and such assistants as deputy, associate, and assistant superintendents. These include activities of all personnel and materials in the office of the chief executive officer.

value.name: COMMUNITY_RELATIONS_SERVICES
value.desc: Community relations services Activities to develop and operate systemwide programs for the bettering of school/community relations.

value.name: STATE_AND_FEDERAL_RELATIONS
value.desc: State and federal relations services Activities to develop and maintain good relations with state and federal officials. These include grant procurement activities.

value.name: OTHER_EXECUTIVE_ADMINISTRATION
value.desc: Other executive administration services Other executive administration services which cannot be classified above.

value.name: SCHOOL_ADMINISTRATION_SUPPORT_
value.desc: School administration support services Activities to perform the overall administrative duties for a school.

value.name: OFFICE_OF_THE_PRINCIPAL_SERV
value.desc: Office of the principal services Activities to direct and manage the operation of a particular school. These include activities performed by the principal, assistant principals, and other assistants when they supervise all operations of the school, evaluate individuals of the school, assign duties to individuals, supervise and maintain the school records, and coordinate school instructional activities with those of the school or school system. These activities also include the work of clerical staff in support of teaching and administrative duties.

value.name: OTHER_SCHOOL_ADMINISTRATION
value.desc: Other school administration support services Other school administration services which cannot be classified above.

value.name: BUSINESS_SUPPORT_SERVICES
value.desc: Business support services Activities to pay, transport, exchange, and maintain goods and services for a school or school system. They include fiscal and internal services necessary for operating the school or school system. These include the activity of the chief business official.

value.name: FISCAL_SERVICES
value.desc: Fiscal services Activities to perform the fiscal operations of a school or school system. These include budgeting, receiving and disbursing, financial and property accounting, payroll, inventory control, internal auditing and managing funds.

value.name: SUPERVISION_OF_FISCAL_SERVICES
value.desc: Supervision of fiscal services Activities to direct, manage, and supervise the fiscal service area. These include the activities of the assistant superintendent, director, or school business official who directs and manages fiscal activities.

value.name: BUDGETING_SERVICES
value.desc: Budgeting services Activities to supervise budget planning, formulation, control, and analysis of finances.

value.name: RECEIVING_AND_DISBURSING_FUNDS
value.desc: Receiving and disbursing funds services Activities to take in and pay out money. These include the current audit of receipts; the pre-audit of requisitions and purchase orders to determine whether the amounts are within the budgetary allowances, and determining that disbursements are lawful expenditures of a school or school system; and the management of school funds.

value.name: PAYROLL_SERVICES
value.desc: Payroll services Activities to periodically pay individuals entitled to remuneration for services rendered. Payments are also made for such payroll associated costs as federal income tax withholding, retirement, and social security.

value.name: FINANCIAL_ACCOUNTING_SERVICES
value.desc: Financial accounting services Activities to maintain the financial records and transactions of a school or school system. These include accounting and interpreting financial transactions and account records.

value.name: INTERNAL_AUDITING_SERVICES
value.desc: Internal auditing services Activities to verify account records including evaluating the adequacy of the internal control system, verifying and safeguarding assets, reviewing the reliability of the accounting and reporting systems, and ascertaining compliance with established policies and procedures.

value.name: PROPERTY_ACCOUNTING_SERVICES
value.desc: Property accounting services Activities to prepare and maintain current inventory records of land, buildings, and equipment. These records are to be used in equipment control and facilities planning.

value.name: OTHER_FISCAL_SERVICES
value.desc: Other fiscal services Other fiscal services which cannot be classified above.

value.name: PURCHASING_SERVICES
value.desc: Purchasing services Activities to purchase supplies, furniture, equipment, and materials used in a school or school system.

value.name: WAREHOUSING_AND_DISTRIBUTING
value.desc: Warehousing and distributing services Activities to receive, store, and distribute supplies, furniture, equipment, materials, and mail. These include cash collection and transportation from school facilities to the central administration office or bank for control and/or deposit.

value.name: PRINTING_PUBLISHING_DUPL
value.desc: Printing, publishing, and duplicating services Activities to print and publish administrative publications such as annual reports, school directories, and manuals. These include centralized services for duplicating school materials and instruments such as school bulletins, newsletters, and notices.

value.name: OTHER_BUSINESS_SUPPORT_SERVICE
value.desc: Other business support services Other business support services which cannot be classified above.

value.name: OPERATION_AND_MAINTENANCE
value.desc: Operation and maintenance of plant services Activities to keep the physical plant open, comfortable, and safe for use, and keep the grounds, buildings, and equipment in effective working condition and state of repair. These include maintaining safety in school buildings, grounds, and in the vicinity of schools.

value.name: SUPERVISION_OF_OPERATION
value.desc: Supervision of operation and maintenance of plant services Activities to direct, manage, and supervise the operation and maintenance of the school plant facilities.

value.name: OPERATING_BUILDINGS_SERVICES
value.desc: Operating buildings services Activities to keep the physical plant clean and ready for daily use. These include operating the heat, light, and ventilation systems and repairing and replacing facilities and equipment.

value.name: CARE_AND_UPKEEP_OF_GROUNDS
value.desc: Care and upkeep of grounds services Activities to maintain and improve the land. These include snow removal, landscaping, ground maintenance, and similar activities.

value.name: CARE_AND_UPKEEP_OF_EQUIP
value.desc: Care and upkeep of equipment services Activities to maintain equipment owned or used by the school or school system. These include servicing and repairing furniture, machines, and movable equipment.

value.name: VEHICLE_GENERAL
value.desc: Vehicle servicing and maintenance services Activities to maintain general purpose vehicles other than student transportation vehicles such as trucks, tractors, graders, and staff vehicles. These include repairing vehicles, replacing vehicle parts, preventative maintenance servicing, cleaning, painting, greasing, fueling, and inspecting vehicles for safety.

value.name: SECURITY_SERVICES
value.desc: Security services Activities to maintain order and safety in school buildings, grounds, and in the vicinity at all times. These include police activities for school functions, traffic control on the grounds and in the vicinity, building alarm systems, and hall monitoring services.

value.name: OTHER_OPERATION_AND_MAINTENANC
value.desc: Other operation and maintenance of plant services Other operation and maintenance of plant services which cannot be classified above.

value.name: STUDENT_TRANSPORTATION_SERVICE
value.desc: Student transportation services Activities to convey students to and from school, as provided by state and federal law. These include trips between home and school, and trips to school activities. They also include specialized equipment (such as special or adapted buses, lifts, and ramps), if required to provide special transportation for a child with a disability.

value.name: SUPERVISION_OF_STUDENT_TRANS
value.desc: Supervision of student transportation Activities to direct, manage, and supervise student transportation services.

value.name: VEHICLE_OPERATION_SERVICES
value.desc: Vehicle operation services Activities to operate vehicles for student transportation from the time the vehicles leave the point of storage until they return to storage. These include driving buses or other student transportation vehicles.

value.name: MONITORING_SERVICES
value.desc: Monitoring services Activities to supervise students in the process of being transported between home and school or between school and school activities. Such supervision can occur while students are in transit, while they are being loaded and unloaded, and in directing traffic at the loading and unloading stations.

value.name: VEHICLE_STUDENT
value.desc: Vehicle servicing and maintenance services Activities to maintain student transportation vehicles. These include repairing vehicles, replacing vehicle parts, cleaning, painting, fueling, and inspecting vehicles for safety.

value.name: DRIVER_TRAINING_SERVICES
value.desc: Driver training services Activities to ensure and maintain safety standards of driver's skills to operate student transportation vehicles. These include training and testing of school bus drivers.

value.name: OTHER_STUDENT_TRANSPORTATION
value.desc: Other student transportation services Other student transportation services which cannot be classified above.

value.name: CENTRAL_SUPPORT_SERVICES
value.desc: Central support services Activities, other than general administration, to support each of the other instructional and support services programs. These include planning, research and development, evaluation, information, staff, statistical, and data processing services.

value.name: PLANNING_RESEARCH_DEV
value.desc: Planning, research, development, and evaluation services Activities to conduct and manage programs of planning, research, development, and evaluation for a school system on a systemwide basis.

value.name: SUPERVISION_OF_MANAGING
value.desc: Supervision of managing, planning, research, development, and evaluation services Activities associated with the direction, management, and supervision of planning, research, development, and evaluation services.

value.name: PLANNING_SERVICES
value.desc: Planning services Activities to select or identify overall, long-range goals, priorities and objectives of an organization or program; and formulate various courses of action needed to achieve those goals. This is done by identifying needs and relative costs and benefits of each course of action.

value.name: RESEARCH_SERVICES
value.desc: Research services Activities to perform systematic study and investigation of various aspects of education undertaken to establish facts and principles.

value.name: DEVELOPMENT_SERVICES
value.desc: Development services Activities to deliberate evolving process of improving educational programs.

value.name: EVALUATION_SERVICES
value.desc: Evaluation services Activities to ascertain or judge the value or amount of an action or an outcome. This is done through careful appraisal of previously specified data in light of a particular situation and the goals and objectives previously established.

value.name: OTHER_PLANNING_RESEARCH_DEV
value.desc: Other planning, research, development, and evaluation services Other planning, research, development, and evaluation services which can not be classified above.

value.name: IS_MAIL
value.desc: Information services Activities to write, edit, and prepare materials for disseminating educational and administrative information to students, staff members, managers, or the general public through direct mailing, the various news media, or personal contact.

value.name: SUPERVISION_OF_INFORMATION
value.desc: Supervision of information services Activities to direct, manage, and supervise information services.

value.name: INTERNAL_INFORMATION_SERVICES
value.desc: Internal information services Activities to write, edit, and provide administrative information to students and staff members.

value.name: PUBLIC_INFORMATION_SERVICES
value.desc: Public information services Activities to write, edit, and prepare materials for disseminating educational and administrative information to the public through various news media or personal contact.

value.name: MANAGEMENT_INFORMATION_SERVICE
value.desc: Management information services Activities to write, edit, and prepare materials for disseminating to management the needed information about the operation of the school or school system, and the community, state, and nation, in order to make logical decisions.

value.name: OTHER_INFORMATION_SERVICES
value.desc: Other information services Other information services which cannot be classified above.

value.name: STAFF_SERVICES
value.desc: Staff services Activities to maintain an efficient staff for a school or school system. These include recruiting and placement, staff transfers, inservice training, health services, and staff accounting.

value.name: SUPERVISION_OF_STAFF_SERVICES
value.desc: Supervision of staff services Activities to direct, manage, and supervise staff services.

value.name: RECRUITMENT_AND_PLACEMENT_SERV
value.desc: Recruitment and placement services Activities to employ and assign personnel for a school or school system.

value.name: STAFF_ACCOUNTING_SERVICES
value.desc: Staff accounting services Activities to maintain the systematic recording and summarization of information relating to individuals employed by a school or school system.

value.name: INSERVICE_TRAINING_SERVICES
value.desc: Inservice training services (for non-instructional staff) Activities to train non-instructional personnel in all classifications. These activities are developed by the school or school system.

value.name: HEALTH_SERVICES_ED
value.desc: Health services Activities to provide medical, dental, and nurse services for the school or school system employees. These include physical examinations, referrals, and emergency care.

value.name: OTHER_STAFF_SERVICES
value.desc: Other staff services Other staff services which cannot be classified above.

value.name: DATA_PROCESSING_SERVICES
value.desc: Data processing services Activities to prepare data for storage, storage of data, and retrieval of them for reproduction as information for management and reporting.

value.name: SUPERVISION_OF_DATA_PROCESSING
value.desc: Supervision of data processing services Activities to direct, manage, and supervise data processing services.

value.name: SYSTEMS_ANALYSIS_SERVICES
value.desc: Systems analysis services Activities to identify and evaluate alternatives for achieving defined objectives, based on judgment and, wherever possible, on quantitative methods. These activities pertain to the development of data processing procedures or application to electronic data processing equipment.

value.name: PROGRAMMING_SERVICES
value.desc: Programming services Activities to prepare a logical sequence of operations to be performed, either manually or electronically, in solving problems or processing data. These also involve preparing coded instructions and data for such sequences.

value.name: OPERATIONS_SERVICES
value.desc: Operations services Activities to schedule, maintain, and produce data. These include operating business machines, data preparation services, and data processing machines.

value.name: OTHER_DATA_PROCESSING_SERVICES
value.desc: Other data processing services Other data processing services which cannot be classified above.

value.name: OTHER_CENTRAL_SUPPORT_SERVICES
value.desc: Other central support services Other central support services which cannot be classified above.

value.name: OTHER_SUPPORT_SERVICES
value.desc: Other support services Other support services which cannot be classified above.

value.name: OPERATION_OF_NON-INSTRUCTIONAL
value.desc: Operation of Non-Instructional Services Activities to provide non-instructional services to students, staff members, or the community.

value.name: FOOD_SERVICES_OPERATIONS
value.desc: Food services operations Activities to provide food to students and staff members in a school or school system. These include preparing and serving regular and incidental meals, lunches, or snacks in connection with school activities, and food delivery.

value.name: SUPERVISION_OF_FOOD_SERVICES
value.desc: Supervision of food services Activities to direct, manage, and supervise food services operations.

value.name: FOOD_PREPARATION_AND_DISPENSING
value.desc: Food preparation and dispensing services Activities to prepare and serve regular and incidental meals, lunches, or snacks to students and staff members in a school or school system. These include cooking, operating kitchen equipment, preparing food, serving food, cleaning dishes, and storing dishes and kitchen equipment.

value.name: FOOD_DELIVERY_SERVICES
value.desc: Food delivery services Activities to deliver food to the school or school system.

value.name: OTHER_FOOD_SERVICES
value.desc: Other food services Other food services which cannot be classified above.

value.name: ENTERPRISE_OPERATIONS
value.desc: Enterprise operations Activities that are financed and operated in a manner similar to private business enterprises with the stated intent that costs are financed or recovered primarily through use charges (e.g., a bookstore in a school or system).

value.name: COMMUNITY_SERVICES_OPERATION
value.desc: Community services operation Activities to provide community services to students, staff or other community participants. These include community recreation programs, civic activities, public libraries, programs of custody and care of children, and community welfare activities. These are provided by the school or school system for the community as a whole or for some segment of the community.

value.name: SUPERVISION_OF_COMMUNITY_SERVICES
value.desc: Supervision of community services activities Activities to direct, manage, and supervise community services activities.

value.name: COMMUNITY_RECREATION_SERVICES
value.desc: Community recreation services Activities to provide recreation for the community as a whole, or for some segment of the community. These include organizing and supervising playgrounds and swimming pools, as well as other recreation programs for the community.

value.name: CIVIC_ACTIVITIES
value.desc: Civic activities Activities to provide services to civic affairs or organizations. These include services to parent-teacher association meetings, public forums, lectures, and civil defense planning.

value.name: PUBLIC_LIBRARY_SERVICES
value.desc: Public library services Activities to operate public libraries by a school or school system, or provide library services to the general public through the school library. These include planning the library's collection in light of community needs and informing the community of public library resources and services.

value.name: CUSTODY_AND_CARE_OF_CHILDREN
value.desc: Custody and care of children Activities to provide programs for the custodial care of children in residential day schools or in child care centers which are not part of, nor directly related to, the instructional program, and where the attendance of the children is not included in the attendance figures for the school or system.

value.name: EXTENDED_DAY_CHILD_CARE
value.desc: Extended day/child care services Activities to provide programs for the custodial care of students enrolled in a school or system before the school day starts and/or after the school day ends.

value.name: WELFARE_ACTIVITIES
value.desc: Welfare activities Activities to provide for the personal needs of individuals who have been designated as needy by an appropriate governmental entity. These include payment of stipends for school attendance; payment of salaries to students for work performed (whether for the school system or for an outside concern); or the provision of clothing, food, or other personal needs.

value.name: OTHER_COMMUNITY_SERVICES
value.desc: Other community services Other community services which cannot be classified above.

value.name: RESIDENTIAL_HOUSING_SERVICES
value.desc: Residential housing services Activities to provide living accommodations for students and individuals in facilities either owned or leased by the school or school system.

value.name: SUPERVISION_OF_RESIDENTIAL
value.desc: Supervision of residential housing services Activities to direct, manage, and supervise residential housing services.

value.name: STUDENT_RESIDENCE_SERVICES
value.desc: Student residence services Activities to provide living accommodations for students in facilities either owned or leased by the school or school system. This category may be subdivided into residences for single students and residences for married students.

value.name: STAFF_RESIDENCE_SERVICES
value.desc: Staff residence services (other than administrative staff) Activities to provide living accommodations for individuals other than administrative staff in facilities either owned or leased by the school or system.

value.name: ADMINISTRATIVE_STAFF_RESIDENCE
value.desc: Administrative staff residence services Activities to provide living accommodations for administrative staff in facilities either owned or leased by the school or system.

value.name: OTHER_RESIDENTIAL_HOUSING
value.desc: Other residential housing services Other residential housing services which cannot be classified above.

value.name: FACILITIES_ACQUISITION
value.desc: Facilities acquisition and construction services Activities to acquire land and buildings; remodel buildings and construct additions to buildings; install and extend service systems and other built-in equipment; and improve sites.

value.name: SITE_ACQUISITION_SERVICES
value.desc: Site acquisition services Activities to initially acquire and improve new sites.

value.name: SITE_IMPROVEMENT_SERVICES
value.desc: Site improvement services Activities to improve sites, and maintain existing site improvements.

value.name: OTHER_FACILITIES
value.desc: Other facilities acquisition and construction services

element.name: Code

element.name: LanguageType

element.name: Dialect

element.name: LearningStandardItemRefId

element.name: PhoneNumber

element.name: Email

value.name: NOT_MARRIED
value.desc: Not married (never married, legally divorced, widowed, or marriage annulled)

object.name: MeetingTime
object.desc: This element represents the meeting times and periods for a course, and occurs within objects such as SectionInfo and StudentSectionEnrollment

element.name: TimetableDay
element.desc: Locally defined rotation cycle day code when the section meets (e.g., in a two day schedule, valid values would be "A" and "B," or "1" and "2").

element.name: TimetablePeriod
element.desc: The period within the day when this section takes place (e.g., "0" through "7").

element.name: MeetingTime
element.desc: Time(s) this section meets.

value.name: HOME
value.desc: The school is responsible for reporting the student's membership/child accounting information

value.name: CONCURRENT
value.desc: The school is not the primary reporting unit for the student's membership/child accounting information

value.name: SUMMER
value.desc: A summer school enrollment, not part of the regular school year

element.name: Prefix

element.name: LastName
element.desc: The last name.

element.name: FirstName

element.name: MiddleName
element.desc: The middle name or initial.

element.name: Suffix
element.desc: Generation of suffix like II, Jr., etc.

element.name: PreferredName
element.desc: This is a name that the person prefers to be called by.

element.name: SortName
element.desc: This is the name to be used for sorting purposes.

element.name: FullName
element.desc: A free text field for the complete name.

object.name: Names
object.desc: Names of a person.

element.name: Name
element.desc: Name of the person.

value.name: PREVIOUS
value.desc: Previous Name (sometimes called Maiden Name of Female Persons)

value.name: TRANSFERRED_TO_DIFFERENT_PUBLIC_SCHOOL_SAME_LEA
value.desc: Student is in a different public school in the same local education agency

value.name: TRANSFERRED_TO_DIFFERENT_PUBLIC_SCHOOL_SAME_STATE
value.desc: Transferred to a public school in a different local education agency in the same state

value.name: TRANSFERRED_TO_PUBLIC_SCHOOL_DIFFERENT_STATE
value.desc: Transferred to a public school in a different state

value.name: TRANSFERRED_TO_PRIVATE_NON_RELIGIOUS_SAME_LEA
value.desc: Transferred to a private, non-religiously-affiliated school in the same local education agency

value.name: TRANSFERRED_TO_PRIVATE_NON_RELIGIOUS_SAME_STATE
value.desc: Transferred to a private, non-religiously-affiliated school in a different local education agency in the same state

value.name: TRANSFERRED_TO_PRIVATE_NON_RELIGIOUS_DIFFERENT_STATE
value.desc: Transferred to a private, non-religiously-affiliated school in a different state

value.name: TRANSFERRED_TO_PRIVATE_RELIGIOUS_SAME_LEA
value.desc: Transferred to a private, religiously-affiliated school in the same local education agency

value.name: TRANSFERRED_TO_PRIVATE_RELIGIOUS_SAME_STATE
value.desc: Transferred to a private, religiously-affiliated school in a different local education agency in the same state

value.name: TRANSFERRED_TO_PRIVATE_RELIGIOUS_DIFFERENT_STATE
value.desc: Transferred to a private, religiously-affiliated school in a different state

value.name: TRANSFERRED_OUTSIDE_OF_COUNTRY
value.desc: Transferred to a school outside of the country

value.name: GRADUATED_WITH_DIPLOMA
value.desc: Graduated with regular, advanced, International Baccalaureate, or other type of diploma

value.name: COMPLETED_BUT_DID_NOT_MEET_ALL_GRADUATION_REQUIREMENTS
value.desc: Completed grade 12, but did not meet all graduation requirements

value.name: ENROLLED_IN_A_POSTSECONDARY_EARLY_ADMISSION_PROGRAM_AND_ELIGIBLE_TO_RETURN
value.desc: Enrolled in a postsecondary early admission program, eligible to return

value.name: RECEIVING_EDUCATIONAL_SERVICES_FROM_SAME_LEA_NO_SCHOOL_ASSIGNMENT
value.desc: Student is in the same local education agency and receiving education services, but is not assigned to a particular school

value.name: ENROLLED_IN_AN_ADULT_EDUCATION_OR_TRAINING_PROGRAM
value.desc: Enrolled in an adult education or training program

value.name: COMPLETED_A_STATE_RECOGNIZED_VOCATIONAL_EDUCATION_PROGRAM
value.desc: Completed a state-recognized vocational education program

value.name: ENROLLED_IN_A_FOREIGN_EXCHANGE_PROGRAM_ELIGIBLE_TO_RETURN
value.desc: Enrolled in a foreign exchange program, eligible to return

value.name: WITHDRAWN_FROM_SCHOOL_UNDER_THE_AGE_FOR_COMPULSORY_ATTENDANCE_AND_ELIGIBLE_TO_RETURN
value.desc: Withdrawn from school, under the age for compulsory attendance; eligible to return

value.name: TRANSFERRED_TO_CHARTER_SCHOOL_SAME_LEA
value.desc: Student is in a charter school managed by the same local education agency

value.name: COMPLETED_WITH_A_STATE_RECOGNIZED_EQUIVALENCY_CERTIFICATE
value.desc: Completed with a state-recognized equivalency certificate

value.name: ALTERNATIVE
value.desc: Attending an area alternative school--The student is attending a public elementary or secondary school that: 1) addresses the needs of students which typically cannot be met in a regular school; 2) provides nontraditional education; 3) serves as an adjunct to a regular school; or 4) falls outside of the categories of regular, special program emphasis or vocational/technical education.

value.name: MAGNET
value.desc: Attending an area magnet program (including gifted and talented or honors programs)--The student is attending an elementary or secondary school program within the public education system that has been designed: 1) to attract students of different racial/ethnic backgrounds for the purpose of reducing, preventing, or eliminating racial isolation; and/or 2) to provide an academic or social focus on a particular theme (e.g., science/math, performing arts, gifted/talented, or foreign language).

value.name: SPECIAL_ED
value.desc: Attending an area special education school--The student is attending an early childhood, elementary or secondary school that focuses primarily on special education and adapts the curriculum, materials, or instruction for students accordingly. This may include instruction for any of the following: autism, deaf-blindness, hearing impairment, mental retardation, multiple disabilities, orthopedic impairment, serious emotional disturbance, specific learning disability, speech or language impairment, traumatic brain injury, visual impairment, and other health impairments.

value.name: VOCATIONAL
value.desc: Attending an area vocational/technical school--The student is attending a school that offers a secondary education program available in regular or trade high schools or separate vocational centers or programs that provide formal preparation for semi-skilled, skilled, technical or professional occupations for high school-aged students who have opted to develop or expand their employment opportunities, often in lieu of preparing for college entry. This type of instruction is often referred to as career and technology preparation.

value.name: PRIVATE_SCHOOL
value.desc: Attending a private school--The student is attending an educational institution administered by a non-governmental agency at the early childhood, elementary, or secondary level.

value.name: COURT_MANDATED
value.desc: Court-mandated juvenile system assignment--The student is completing an assignment in a juvenile system to fulfill a court mandate.

value.name: HOME_SCHOOLING
value.desc: Home schooling--The student is receiving educational instruction offered in a home environment, as regulated by state law, for reasons other than health.

value.name: LEA
value.desc: Local education agency (LEA) assignment--The student is enrolled in a school outside of his or her attendance area as assigned by an LEA (e.g., for cost-saving measures or for desegregation purposes).

value.name: MIGRANT_PROGRAM
value.desc: Migrant education program participation--The student is enrolled in a school outside of his or her attendance area because he or she, or his or her parent/guardian, is a migrant worker.

value.name: OPEN_ENROLLMENT
value.desc: Open enrollment--The student is enrolled in a school outside of his or her own attendance area by choice, as permitted by state or local policy.

value.name: VOUCHER
value.desc: Voucher--The student is enrolled in a private school through the use of vouchers, as permitted by state or local policy.

value.name: CHARTER_SCHOOL
value.desc: Charter school--The student is enrolled in a charter school as permitted by state or local policy.

element.name: ProvidingInstruction
element.desc: Flag that indicates if the reporting organization is providing instruction to the student.

element.name: ProvidingServices
element.desc: Flag that indicates if the reporting organization is providing services that are not related to instruction to the student. An example of a non-instructional service is transportation.

element.name: FinanciallyResponsible
element.desc: Flag that indicates if the reporting organization is financially responsible for the student.

element.name: OtherCode
element.desc: A state/province code, local code, other code or a text string that crosswalks to or serves as a translation of an associated Code element.

object.name: PartialDateType

element.name: LocalId
element.desc: The locally-assigned identifier for this person. Note: LocalId may be used as a unique person identifier rather than a unique contact identifier. In this case there may be more than one object instance with the same LocalId.

element.name: OtherIdList
element.desc: Lists all "other" identifiers associated with the person.

element.name: OtherNames

element.name: Demographics

element.name: AddressList

element.name: PhoneNumberList

element.name: EmailList

element.name: Extension
